- [ Core Audio ](/documentation/coreaudio)

-  AudioGetHostClockFrequency() 

Function# AudioGetHostClockFrequency()

iOS 2.0+iPadOS 2.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.0+

```
func AudioGetHostClockFrequency() -> Float64
```

## [Return Value](/documentation/coreaudio/audiogethostclockfrequency()#return-value)

A Float64 containing the number of ticks per second in the host time base.

## [Discussion](/documentation/coreaudio/audiogethostclockfrequency()#discussion)

Gets the number of ticks per second in the host time base.
